item.description:
Come ride the space lanes of the 'Verse. You know you have always wanted to.
Serenity, the Role Playing Game, Firefly comes alive!

This is the January installment of our series of one-shot RPG experiences to be offered monthly over the course of 2011. Each month will feature a different GM running a new game. This month's GM is diarmudodea.

Got a game on your shelf that you've been itching to run, but your regular group just isn't interested? Why not run it for us at the Role-Playing Fellowship of Greater Boston! We want to continue running one-shot games throughout 2011, and you can help!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with Nathan Fillion signing autographs from noon to 2. (In you dreams, fan-girls)
item.name: January One-Shot - Serenity
